doc.title: The Winner of the Name a Thai Restaurant is.......
doc.text: Congratulations/JJ to/TO INDIGO/VB who/WP has/VBZ won/RB the/DT naming/VBG of/IN a/DT Thai/JJ Kitchen/NN competition/NN !/. There/EX were/VBD a/DT lot/NN of/IN great/JJ suggestions/NN that/WDT have/VBN been/VBN submitted/VBG so/IN it/PRP was/VBD not/RB an/DT easy/JJ decision/NN to/TO make/VB ./. But/CC after/IN much/JJ consideration/NN ,/, Jamie/NN and/CC Joe/NN has/VBZ decided/VBD to/TO change/NN the/DT name/NN of/IN the/DT restaurant/NN to/TO :/: Now/RB two/CD other/JJ people/NNS have/VB also/RB picked/VB the/DT same/JJ name/NN ,/, sumosumo/NN and/CC damien/NN but/CC because/IN Indigo/NN was/VBD the/DT first/JJ ,/, he/PRP has/VBZ won/IN the/DT dinner/NN for/IN six/CD ./. The/DT judges/NN decision/NN is/VBZ final/JJ and/CC blah/JJ blah/NN blah/NN .../: Please/MD write/VB to/TO my/PRP$ email/NN and/CC I/PRP will/VB link/VB you/PRP up/VB with/IN Joe/NN 's/POS Kitchen/NN for/IN your/PRP$ meal/NN there/RB ./. Thanks/JJ to/TO everyone/VB who/WP took/VBD part/NN in/IN the/DT competition/NN !/.
